createRewardVault(address).details: Reverts if the staking token is not a contract.

params.stakingToken: The address of the staking token.

returns._0: The address of the new vault.

params.stakingToken: The address of the staking token.
The address of the staking token.

returns._0: The address of the reward vault.

allVaultsLength().notice: Gets the number of vaults that have been created.

createRewardVault(address).notice: Creates a new reward vault vault for the given staking token.

getVault(address).notice: Gets the vault for the given staking token.

predictRewardVaultAddress(address).notice: Predicts the address of the reward vault for the given staking token.
